attributes.action: Recornise married couples by giving us a separate tax allowance which we had many years ago..
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many years ago we used to have a married tax allowance which helped couples keep one parent at home looking after the family.  We have lost the married family recognition and would like the Government to recognise the family in marriage.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Family-Tax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
